subject: Re: Send your Spirit Pics and Evp's to the Maury Show
author: misujoey
full_text:
Hey Misty .. My computer crashed also!! ... I had to scrape up my 
first recordings from old e-mails and forums ...and I still forget to 
back-up!!  

Hope you post the one from your Mom .. and send recordings and spirit 
photos .. I'll help you pick if you need help!!

Debbie





--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty" <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Cool Debbie. Sending all 1.5 million of them to him now hehehe. 
Just 
> kiddin. I wouldnt know where to start/end. 
> 
> I did get one evp last night I am excited about tho. Was a nice 
gift. A 
> repeat of my very first evp from my mother, saying exactly what she 
> said how she said it all those years ago. A bit off on her soft 
tone 
> voice but the message was the same. It is loud and clear and was 
using 
> ST method which she doesnt like to use usually.
> 
> I was always a bit disheartened that I didnt know what I was doing 
when 
> I got that first message and screwed up on saving it before my pc 
> crashed. I didnt think it would ever be recovered completely to how 
I 
> heard it that night. But for this one I saved it right, no pc 
crashin 
> goin on, and now I am left with a nice repeat today to hold onto.
> 
> I may post that to the files area in a bit. 
> 
> Misty
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "misujoey" <Debbie@> wrote:
> >
> > The Maury Show is asking for Evp's and Spirit Video and Photos ..
> > 
> > Jeffrey Wands, Chris, and I did a quick "How to" segment for 
> > people "new" to the Paranormal World ...
> > 
> > www.1800heaven.com/aboutme.htm
> > 
> > Debbie
> >
>
